display.title: Cobble is Life
description: &&o&&7This quest's subject is optional, but may still be of interest to you. We've put it here in the name of completeness.&&r

The &&3Rock Breaker&&r generates different types of igneous Rocks. In order to operate, &&9Water&&r and &&cLava&&r (doesn't need to be source blocks) must both be adjacent to it. Those rocks might be pulverized and electrolyzed into certain materials.
Certain rocks, such as &&b&&cRed Granite&&r, need up to &&5EV&&r power to generate.
&&eAny&&r Rock Breaker will complete this Quest.

&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o Obsidian requiring Redstone to generate is in reference to an ancient Minecraft bug, &&7MC-4239&&f. Placing Redstone where the Cobblestone would go in a cobble generator would make it generate Obsidian instead. This bug was resolved in snapshot 14w25b for Minecraft 1.8, over 9 years ago at the time of writing!
